text: Sister Cecilia Anne Wanner, O.P. Appointed 13th President of Aquinas College
Sister Cecilia Anne Wanner, O.P. Appointed 13th President of Aquinas College

With the support of the Board of Directors and the General Council of the Dominican Sisters of St. Cecilia, Mother Anna Grace Neenan, O.P., Chair of the Board of Directors and Prioress General of St. Cecilia Congregation, has appointed Sister Cecilia Anne Wanner, O.P. as the 13th President of Aquinas College.
“St. Thomas Aquinas on the Blessed Mother: Her Genius, Her Beauty, Her Freedom, and Her Love,” given by Fr. Thomas Petri, O.P. of the Eastern Province.
This January 28 lecture is part of a week-long celebration of St. Thomas Aquinas, the Angelic Doctor, January 27-30.
A Seminar, “Person, Nature, and Human Flourishing” presented by Sister Mary Diana Dreger, O.P., M.D. will begin January 27.
The ten sessions are free to the public, Monday nights 7-8 p.m.

The Center for Catholic Education will host a Catholic Educators’ Pilgrimage June 22 – July 1, 2020.
Join us in Naples, Salerno, Monte Cassino, Rome, and Bracciano for this unique formation opportunity.

A bilingual initiative of the Center for Evangelization and Catechesis. Registration is now open!
The 5th Annual WISE Conference will be held at Aquinas June 29 – July 2, 2020. Registration is open.
WISE is a 4-day conference on the nature, purpose, and mission of the Catholic school.

Applicants Seeking to Audit a Course

We are here to help you explore the possibilities at Aquinas College for your future!
Our students are dedicated to probing Truth.
Each class is an encounter of faith and reason, dialogue and reflection, in an atmosphere of faith.
At Aquinas College, you will find yourself immersed in learning alongside the Nashville Dominicans and other students personally committed to developing God’s gifts in themselves and others.
Aquinas alumni actively form Christian culture because it’s who they are: formed to preach, serve, and engage culture in truth and charity.

Our dedicated staff look forward to speaking with you and discussing how Aquinas College may be the right fit for you. We invite you to explore our programs in education and the liberal arts and to become familiar with our admissions pages.
Consider what it would be like to learn alongside several generations of current and future Catholic educators and life-long lovers of Truth. We hope you will visit!
